title: Chapter 1819 - Cooperation
body:
Chapter 1819 - Cooperation

As the medicinal power permeated her soul body, the wraith erupted with vitality.

But Su Yi knew it was temporary. It wouldn’t be long before she disappeared from this world completely. He immediately chanted a series of strange, inscrutable syllables tinged with an ancient, boundless rhythm. 

The wraith trembled in obvious excitement, then looked at Su Yi and responded in the same inscrutable language.

Xi Ning and Fan Zhui couldn’t make heads or tails of it. They had no idea what the wraith and Su Yi were discussing. 

They’ve got to be using the secret language of the Dragon Palace! Fellow Daoist Su must be asking that wraith about the Dragon Palace! 

When Fan Zhui reached this conclusion, his expression filled with astonishment. Su Yi’s abilities are simply ridiculous! He doesn’t just have heaven-defying combat prowess. He can even neutralize karmic power and use the secret language of the Dragon Palace to communicate with a long-dead wraith!

Xi Ning watched their exchange too. No wonder he was so confident. This was his plan all along.

When it came to knowledge of the ruins of the Dragon Palace, who could possibly...
